articles.content: Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli, Ab de Villiers, and Jasprit Bumrah won awards to celebrate IPL's 15-year anniversary |Courtesy-BCCI/IPL

articles.title: Liverpool owner John Henry rules out club sale; instead seeking investment - ESPN India
articles.description: Liverpool's American owner, John Henry, said there are no plans to sell the club; owners had said in November they were exploring a sale.
articles.content:
Liverpool's American owner, John Henry, said there are no plans to sell the Premier League club after the Merseyside outfit's owners said in November they were exploring a sale.
